statements: DELETE FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE production_line_id = 100 AND time_stamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM production_line_performance_data WHERE efficiency_rate < 0.8 AND production_rate > 500;
DELETE FROM production_line_performance WHERE production_line_id = 1 AND efficiency < 0.7;
DELETE FROM real_time_data WHERE temperature > 100 AND speed < 50 AND pressure < 20;
DELETE FROM real_time_data WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM production_line_performance WHERE product_id = 456 AND efficiency < 0.8;
DELETE FROM production_errors WHERE line_id = 100 AND error_message = 'Machine Failure';
DELETE FROM production_errors WHERE line_id = 5 AND error_message LIKE '%critical%';
